short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Google Chrome plugin to detect numbers on a webpage to dial from your phone

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This plugin will connect to your ITP Voice account and allow you to dial phone numbers detected on a web page through your device.
